column4: a bit of help? i am trying to set up a wireless connection, but it wont work for some reason..
i'm not much good with encrytption or x86 based stuff. all my eqpt was made by Apple
on a ppc? hows that working?
anybody good with wireless? i could use some help
there are some things that don't work well (or at all), but mostly its all good
what sort of things dont work?
i have not gotten java to work (am not interested in doing flips and somersaults to achieve java installation)
swf_play takes over my system (i have to kill -9 the multiple instances)
swf, that sucks...lots of sites have swf embedded
there are soem things that are not as dev'd for the PPC as there are for the x86
yeah, its new, but i'll get better...
anyone,  a bit of help with wireless?
i set up ndiswrapper and entered in the password (WPA), but it doesnt work..
had to build from source several components of my sound (libfaac, libfaad <<whatever they are called, etc)
